explains: n. 声调，语调；吟咏，吟诵；（素歌的）起始短句；（演奏或唱歌中的）音准

sentences.en: His voice had a very slight German intonation.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音中有一点德语语调。

sentences.en: We worked on pronunciation, stress and intonation.
sentences.cn: 我们学习了语音、重读和语调。

sentences.en: It may include minor lapses, or minor difficulties with pronunciation or intonation patterns, which do not affect overall intelligibility.
sentences.cn: 它可能包括发音或语调模式上的小错误或小困难，这些小错误并不影响整体的可理解性。
